column2: The Digital Media Planner provides media planning recommendations and offers resourceful problem-solving, both internally and externally, while maintaining successful client relationships.      S/he prepares media plans and other deliverables, and executes media plan implementation for assigned client accounts.        This position will have responsibility to manage day-to-day planning and analysis while maintaining strong relationships with media vendors, clients and partner agencies.      The responsibilities are many, various, and not limited to those written in this document.      These responsibilities must be directed continuously toward maintaining exceptional service to the client and providing timely deliverables, i.e., Media Plans, Point-of-Views (POVs), and related media analyses        Job Responsibilities includes Develop strategically media recommendations with supporting rationale      Develop and execute media plans Manage & analyze campaigns, and recommend tactical changes to maximize campaign performance      Assist in analysis of research to develop strategies and tactics Work with analytics, trafficking, ad-serving, and finance departments as part of the media management process      Manage day-to-day plan changes and maintenance of media plans      Respond to competitive requests Research and compile competitive data Other responsibilities as assigned      Qualifications                Knowledge of all aspects of Digital Media, including Search, SEO, SMM, Mobile , Programmatic etc.        Basic understanding of the principles of marketing and advertising, as well as an understanding of media concepts and terms,    creative and budget requirements        Ability to prioritize and multi-task, work successfully with teams, and work under pressure        Strong communication, project management and time management skills        Working knowledge on Excel , PowerPoint and Microsoft Word skills

As an E-Commerce Executive, you will be responsible for overseeing the online sales and presence of our company. This includes managing our e-commerce platform, implementing SEO strategies to drive traffic and improve search rankings, and analyzing data to optimize our online performance.      You will work closely with our marketing and product teams to develop and implement marketing campaigns that drive online sales and increase brand awareness. You will also be responsible for managing our online store, including product listings, pricing, and inventory management.      To be successful in this role, you should have at least 0.5-2 years of experience in e-commerce, with a strong understanding of SEO and online marketing. You should also be a creative problem-solver with excellent project management skills.

Knowledge of Amazon paid advertising experience (pay-per-click)     Digital Marketing Experience.     Excellent written and verbal communication skills.     Strong analytical and data interpretation skills.         Key Skills :         Advanced Excel Skill, Communication Skills, Analytical, Data Interpretation Skills, Digital Marketing, Project Management,etc.

column2: Job Objective Seeking a Senior Visual Communication Designer who can not only interpret business requirements but also set new benchmarks in creativity as we continue to scale. Who is not afraid of trying something new. This role is responsible for conceiving, implementing, and supervising concepts, brand guidelines, and strategies across creative projects and ensuring they meet completion standards. Job Description - Lead the design team and supervise the creation of finished artworks for a diverse array of branding, marketing, and communication materials including but not limited to packaging, brochures, event collaterals, presentations, social media & website creatives, etc. -Collaborate with the marketing and sales departments in developing & executing marketing plans - Report progress of projects at major stages of their conception, creation, and execution - Evaluate trends, assess new data, and keep up-to-date with the latest marketing and design techniques. - Produce promotional materials by developing basic presentation approaches and directing layout, design, and copywriting. - Visually execute marketing strategies by examining objectives and planning, scheduling, and completing design and production requirements for direct marketing, online and offline marketing, advertising, and performance marketing. - Monitor, revise, and improve marketing plan and quality results by studying creative processes, analyzing campaign results, and implementing necessary changes. - Establish and articulate the creative vision and a visual communications language for all branding, advertising campaigns, and marketing communications. - Leverage expert knowledge in consumer psychology to craft visually compelling marketing materials that resonate with diverse audience segments. Collaborate with the marketing team to translate consumer behavior insights into design solutions that effectively communicate brand values and product benefits. - Act as a design lead in cross-functional teams to align visual strategies with organizational goals and maintain consistent brand communication. - Plan and execute creative outputs for social media in coordination with the marketing team, leveraging the design team's skills to enhance brand engagement and presence across platforms. - Drive innovation in design practices, staying on top of emerging trends and technologies to ensure our branding remains dynamic, competitive and relevant. - Help in creating corporate assets and collaterals such as presentations, company decks, brochures, etc. Education - Required: BSc/BA in Advertising, Fine Art, Design, Visual Communication, or a relevant field. Prefferd: Masters. - Experience: Demonstrable design experience with a strong portfolio emphasizing graphic design, visual communication, and branding. - Knowledge: Profound understanding of design principles, copywriting, web practices, marketing, production, website design, corporate identity, product packaging, advertisements, and multimedia design. Skills - Design Software Proficiency: Expertise in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc), CorelDraw, AI Tools, Microsoft Powerpoint. - Project Management: Strong time management and project coordination skills, capable of meeting tight deadlines and managing multiple projects simultaneously. - Communication: Excellent ability to give and receive constructive criticism, fostering a collaborative and innovative design environment. - Integrated Marketing: Experienced in creating content that spans all marketing channels, including digital, social media, paid media, and traditional print mediums. - Creative Leadership: Hands-on experience leading the creative process within marketing and graphic design projects, with a focus on brand development and maintaining brand integrity across all platforms. - Crisis Management - Caring personality is a non-negotiable
column11: CorelDraw, InDesign, Illustrator, Microsoft Powerpoint, Photoshop, Senior Graphic Designer, Creative Head, branding, Visual Communication Designer, graphic design, visual communication, Creative Designer, Project Management

column2: You will be responsible for managing client accounts, developing and implementing brand strategies, overseeing social media content/brand strategy and creation process. Responsibilities : Design a research-based brand strategy and new concepts Creating and presenting storyboards Writing copy for advertising and communication campaigns Working with account executives to determine client needs and budget Ensuring campaigns stay within budget Working with art directors to create ideas Performing search engine optimization techniques Staying updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and creative tools Participating in brainstorming sessions and ideation processes Working closely with designers, content creators, and developers Visualizing and conceptualizing client campaigns Managing content calendars of clients Leading and managing junior copy/content writers Crafting innovative marketing solutions, managing integrated marketing efforts across multiple platforms, and scaling existing intellectual properties for continued success and profitability. Campaign Strategy and Planning : Work with internal teams to develop and present comprehensive advertising strategies that align with client requirements. Project Coordination : Oversee the end-to-end execution of advertising campaigns, ensuring all elements are delivered on time and meet quality standards. Coordinate with creative, digital, and other teams to ensure seamless project workflows. Provide regular updates to clients on project progress, campaign performance, and any relevant industry developments. Address client queries, concerns, and feedback promptly and effectively. Quality Assurance:  Conduct thorough reviews of deliverables to ensure they align with client expectations and agency standards. Implement quality control processes to minimize errors and enhance client satisfaction. Strategic Planning:  Collaborate with internal teams to develop long-term strategic plans for clients, identifying opportunities for growth and expansion. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Business, or a related field. Proven experience as an Account Manager in an advertising agency or a similar client-facing role. Skills Required: Person with strong content selling and understanding capability. The ability to hold solid discussions with Director/ leadership levels in clients and dig out problem statements. Analyzing trends and ability to devise a marketing / branding/ activation solution is another capability we need. Media mix can be learnt (though knowing media would be a plus). A mix of a BD profile with content selling would do well Mandatory: Experience in account management and client relationship management Strong project management and organizational skills Knowledge of Social Media Content / Strategy Proficient in Copywriting Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Ability to work independently and in a team Flexibility to work remotely and in the office Experience in the creative agency or social media marketing is a plus Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field Compensation & Benefits Salary : Based on candidate experience & profile/ Not a Constraint/ Negotiable/ Open Quarterly Performance Bonus  : Apart from salary there are performance based quarterly bonuses as well. Working Days - 2nd & 4th Saturday Off in a month Leaves - 28 paid leaves in an year Free Health Insurance Provident Fund Location Connectivity :  5-10 min distance from NHPC Metro Station (Faridabad)

Collaborate with clients to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables, ensuring alignment with their strategic goals and priorities. Develop customized strategies and action plans to address clients' challenges and capitalize on opportunities for growth and optimization. Provide expert advice and guidance on business strategy, operations management, organizational structure, and other relevant areas. Lead workshops, presentations, and training sessions to communicate findings, recommendations, and implementation plans to key stakeholders. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including project managers, IT specialists, and subject matter experts, to implement solutions and monitor progress. Qualifications: Strong analytical skills, including the ability to interpret complex data, conduct root cause analysis, and develop actionable insights and recommendations. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage with stakeholders at all levels and convey complex concepts in a clear and concise manner. Demonstrated expertise in strategic planning, process improvement, organizational design, and change management. Proficiency in project management methodologies and tools, with the ability to effectively manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines. Strong business acumen and industry knowledge, with experience across diverse sectors such as manufacturing, technology, healthcare, finance, etc. Highly adaptable and collaborative, with a proactive mindset and a passion for driving innovation and continuous improvement.   Perks and benefits   Continual training and development opportunities are provided to refine your expertise, ensuring you stay at the cutting edge. column2: Job Roles and Responsibilities :  Graphic Design: - Create visually appealing graphics for various platforms including digital advertisements, social media, websites, marketplaces and print materials. - Develop brand identities, logos, and marketing collateral that align with the company's brand guidelines. - Design layouts, illustrations, and other visual elements for both online and offline materials.     Video Editing: - Edit and enhance video content for promotional materials, advertisements, tutorials, and presentations. - Utilize video editing software to add effects, transitions to enhance the visual appeal of the videos. - Incorporate audio elements, including music, voiceovers, and sound effects, to enhance the overall video quality.     Software Proficiency: - Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign for creating and editing graphics. - Experienced in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools for editing and enhancing videos. Collaboration: - Collaborate with the marketing team and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and objectives. - Communicate effectively with team members to ensure timely delivery of high-quality design assets. - Incorporate feedback and make revisions to designs as necessary to meet project goals and client expectations.     Creative Thinking: - Stay updated on design trends, techniques, and industry best practices to continuously improve the quality of design work. - Bring innovative ideas and creative solutions to design projects to make them stand out in the market. - Adapt designs to suit different platforms and mediums while maintaining brand consistency and visual identity.     Project Management: - Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, prioritizing tasks based on deadlines and project requirements. - Maintain organized file structures and documentation to ensure efficient workflow and easy access to design assets. - Track project progress, meet deadlines, and report on project status to supervisors or project managers.     Quality Control: - Ensure all design assets meet the company's quality standards and brand guidelines. - Conduct thorough reviews of design work to identify and correct any errors or inconsistencies before final delivery. - Perform quality checks on video content to ensure seamless playback and optimal viewing experience across different devices and platforms.    Basic Qualification: Bachelors in Design or Diploma from any renowned institute like Maac / Arena etc. Must have an experience with Brand or an agency of atleast 3-5 years.

column1: Hiring Brand Development Associate |Fresher | Delhi | Immediate Joiner
column2: Hello!!!!! Future Brand Development Associates About Us: Echobooom conducts a symphony of success, transforming businesses into harmonious ensembles that captivate audiences and create a lasting impact. By joining Echobooom, you enter a realm where mediocrity is banished and greatness is embraced. We offer a vibrant ecosystem where innovation thrives, talents flourish, and dreams turn into reality. We are looking for an energetic Brand development Associate to help drive our sales and grow the business. You will attract new clients and build solid relationships with them while maintaining existing relationships. Other duties will include market research, developing business strategies and pitches, managing a variety of projects, and identifying new business opportunities. You will work with various departments and report to the Head of Business Development. The successful applicant will be resourceful, organized and motivated to increase sales, enhance the company's reputation, and look for new and creative ways to market our products. A background in sales or marketing is strongly desirable. Responsibilities: Willing to familiarize yourself with the company's vision and mission, seeking to accomplish set goals and objectives. Conducting market research and identifying potential clients. Cultivating strong relationships with new clients, while maintaining existing client relationships. Collating and maintaining client information in the CRM database. Working closely with staff across departments to implement growth strategies. Developing and implementing sales strategies, client service and retention plans, and analyzing sales data to inform or update marketing strategies. Assist with drafting business plans, sales pitches, presentations, reference material, and other documents as required. Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently and meet deadlines. Identify new business opportunities and partners. Demonstrate strong interpersonal skills with the ability to engage effectively with various levels of management, staff, and clients. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in business management, marketing, or related field. 0 - 1 years' relevant work experience in business development or similar field preferred. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and work under pressure. Strong organization and project management skills. Friendly and personable demeanor. We are looking for immediate joiners to fill this position. Office Location -  Rajouri Garden, New Delhi  Join us at Echobooom and let your superpowers shine! Apply now by sharing your CV to HR, we look forward to hearing from you and discovering the potential of working together to achieve great things! You can share your CV on the given Email Address and WhatsApp Number, email Address - recruitment1lko@echobooom.com contact - 8858409992 Thanks & Regards, Poorvi Vishwakarama ( Team Echobooom)

column2: From the beginning of OML as an artist management agency to the advent of modern-day content marketing, we have helped our clients thrive in the face of disruption while setting trends in talent representation, marketing and sponsorship; inspiring industry change in events and licensing; and helping reshape the digital landscape        As technology further shifts the balance of power in media and puts more power in the hands of the creator, OML is uniquely positioned to create opportunities for our clients and partners around the glob                 Key responsibilities:                    Secure brand partnerships and top-notch deals for Artists by understanding their unique selling points.              Responsible for optimizing revenue generation for our Artists              Manage end to end Artist relationships to become the trusted source for their marketing needs              Manage all incoming enquiries and outgoing pitches for creators managed by OML              Liaising with internal and external teams to ensure smooth execution of campaigns              Someone who is able to ideate & come up with solutions.              Ideate on briefs exploring new opportunities for marketing innovation and implementing              Discover and leverage insights and trends to develop strategic recommendations for brand building and campaigns across paid, owned, earned channels              Ensuring timely invoicing and payment schedules with clients across projects                    Required Skills:                    Must have project management, influencer marketing and campaign execution experience in the past              Someone with brand solutions background              Strong communication and presentation skills; confident engaging with clients and partners to discuss strategy and execution - good at simplifying complex challenges              Ability to multitask and prioritize              Fortitude to stay calm under pressure              A good understanding of paid, owned, earned digital ecosystems is a plus.              Our values:              We build opportunities for our artists, brands and fans; and it s important for us to be reliable and efficient              We demonstrate honesty, excellence and commitment to success              It s not my job is not part of our vocabulary, we even stuff envelopes              We make mistakes, but only to learn from them to build resilience              We take care of ourselves and our colleagues              We are our own managers              We are committed to equality and inclusion              We are mindful of the strain on the Earths resources and are committed to reversing the trend with our behaviours where possible

column2: We are on the lookout for a Senior Manager of client services & brand strategy to lead our client servicing team      You will be the bridge between our clients and our creative teams, ensuring seamless communication, project execution, and client satisfaction      This role demands a mix of strategic insight, business acumen, and a deep understanding of advertising, digital marketing and creative content production                Key responsibilities    :        Lead and manage the client services team, setting high standards for client engagement, project management, and service delivery.      Act as a senior advisor to key clients, understanding their business goals, challenges, and market opportunities to provide strategic guidance and solutions.      Ensure the delivery of high-quality projects on time and within budget, maintaining the agencys reputation for excellence.      Develop and nurture long-term client relationships, identifying opportunities for account growth and new business development.      Collaborate closely with the creative, content, strategy, and production teams to ensure a cohesive and integrated approach to all client projects.      Monitor and report on client and project performance, providing insights and recommendations to both clients and internal teams.      Lead pitch teams in developing and presenting proposals for new business opportunities.      Contribute to the overall leadership and strategic direction of the agency.      Maintain a healthy P&L for the team ensuring high efficiency, performance and profitability      Lead and encourage teams to perform to the best of their ability      Manage teams work flow and load      Manage team expectations and take active interest in their personal & professional development      Ensure timely team reviews & OKRs        Technical Skills:        Significant experience in professional client relationship management      A solid background in digital content, digital marketing or advertising      The ability to plan and strategize at a senior level      A persuasive and confident approach to creative projects      Excellent written and oral communication skills      Effective team management capabilities      A keen attention to detail and budgetary restraints      Full awareness of creative processes and techniques including digital platforms      The willingness to note relevant trends and develop ideas      Exceptional presentation skills to develop ideas and concepts into compelling campaign lead strategies      Creativity, attention to detail, and adaptability      Ability to drive creative direction and vision for multiple projects simultaneously      Knowledge of how video content development works is an advantage      Should be well adept with global & Indian trends, formats and developments in branded content        Qualifications and Prior Experience:        At least 9-12 years of experience in building creative digital branded content campaigns at a publisher, agency or media house      Understanding and past experience creating integrated content across all marketing channels from digital, social media, paid media, mobile      Proven experience with concept development including long form Content      Strong creative vision with an understanding of business objectives      Track record of creating ideas for global or large regional brands. Previous work experience on alcohol brands is a plus      Expertise in social best practice across all platforms.      Have deep knowledge in running a 360-campaign, from strategy development to tactical execution (including AV/trailers, digital/social, OTT)

column2: Working closely with the Founder and Creative Director, you will help develop creative ideas, building out the creative for campaigns and managing the execution of digital content with the brand strategy.      Required to take the idea from conception to delivering the final project, working with photographers, videographers, editors and understanding the different edits needed for various channels. Working closely with the founding team, you will weave the creative concepts in to the marketing calendar and be expected to organise a team to execute the creative ideas.      As our brand continues to grow, we want to be at the forefront of creative campaigns, creating content to excite, encourage and inspire our community, with our jewellery and brand identity at the core. You will develop new and innovative ways of engaging with our customers.      The Digital Creative Content Manager will ensure that the content we are creating is being used on the right channels, that our tone of voice is correct, as well as coming up with new ideas of increasing engagement with the content.      Within this role, the Digital Creative Content Manager is the guardian of key trends and best practices within digital content distribution, analysing and measuring content performance.        The Ideal Candidate:        We d love you to be creative through and through, a passionate people person with a great sense of humour and the ability to manage others in your team.      You will have a great work ethic, initiative and set with a positive can-do attitude.      You ll be comfortable handling multiple tasks at any one time, have a natural knack to work to deadlines and be a great team player.      You are a perfectionist, taking pride in creating and delivering consistently high quality content ideas and generation.        Your Skills & Experience:        - A strong understanding of content in all its forms, including copy, video, photography, graphical    - Exposure to and a keen interest in cutting edge digital tools    - Contacts in the creative industry a plus    - Knowledge of all digital content distribution channels    - Experience managing a team    - Work to tight deadlines    - Project management skills    - Excellent copy writing skills    - Up-to-date on latest fashion & lifestyle trends    - Solid e-commerce, digital and social experience    - A doer, not just a smart thinker    - Skilled at building relationships    - Video editing and ability to shoot photo and video skills are a bonus

column2: Job Title:  Senior Advertising Copywriter   Location:  M.G Road, Agra   Job Type:  Full-time   Experience:  8-12 years Job Description:  We are in search of a Senior Advertising Copywriter to join our team at M.G Road, Agra, for a full-time position. In this role, you will be responsible for creating captivating and persuasive copy across various advertising mediums to effectively communicate brand messages and drive consumer engagement. Roles and Responsibilities: 1. Develop innovative and compelling copy for advertising campaigns across print, digital, social media, and audiovisual platforms. 2. Collaborate closely with the creative team to conceptualize and execute advertising strategies that align with client objectives and brand identity. 3. Interpret client briefs and market research to deliver copy that resonates with target audiences and achieves desired campaign outcomes. 4. Ensure consistency in brand messaging and adherence to brand guidelines across all advertising materials. 5. Stay updated on industry trends, consumer behavior, and advertising best practices to inform copywriting decisions and maintain a competitive edge. 6. Edit and proofread copy to ensure accuracy, clarity, and effectiveness. 7. Present and articulate creative ideas internally and to clients, incorporating feedback and making revisions as necessary. 8. Mentor junior copywriters, providing guidance and support to foster their professional growth within the team. Eligibility Criteria & Talent Required: 1. column2: At Tag, we help brands stand out and sell more by delivering impactful content, at speed and scale and across channels & geographies. With over fifty years of production experience for some of the worlds biggest brands, we partner with our clients to create work that is efficient, effective, and more importantly tells a story. We are a dynamic and innovative creative production agency that prides itself on delivering cutting-edge technology solutions. We believe that the combination of different ideas, experience, backgrounds, and skillsets create a great place to work. We pride ourselves on an authentic culture built around our core values of integrity, innovation, sustainability, growth, and accountability. We are committed to promoting an inclusive, equitable and diverse culture. Our global DE&I committee and our leadership team have committed to increasing representation, education, and accountability across the entire business to create positive change from the ground up and the top down. Check out tagww.com to learn more. Job Purpose The Art Director will be responsible for leading the campaign strategy, art direction, and day-today-administration functions for the creative team. The creative team includes of a mix of designers, visualizers, brand guardians, art directors, copy writers, copy leads, offline video editors, AFX & VFX artists & a postproduction leads, all of whom will report to the Art Director either directly or indirectly.  The Art Director will be supported in this function by a studio manager who will monitor day-to-day deliveries. Final accountability for all deliveries by the team, however, lies with the Art Director. Art Director approach to communication and design must be medium agnostic, as the teams deliveries range from simple concept notes, to print, digital & video collateral, for brands as well as internal consumption within the company. Job Qualification Degree in Art, Design, Advertising or related field preferred. 13+ years of experience in Creative in Advertising and/or Marketing Must have head a team of at least 10  Job Relationships Reports to Head of Operations  India  Should be willing to travel on business trips. Background Should have all relevant software skills, including Adobe Creative Suite, Blender, Maya, FCP, Marketo, MS Office and others. Knowledge of digital & social platforms is also expected. Should have excellent knowledge of Digital Printing Artwork processes, its limitations and needs within the design process. Familiarity with film-making techniques/ video/animation/broadcast streams is particularly useful. Video editing, copywriting and HTML skills are usually needed. Job Responsibilities Be an integral part of the pitching, planning and related thinking processes, to develop concepts for advertising or promotional campaigns Able to work with Project management desk to derive pricing and rate cards for prospective clients Confident to present range of solutions to client even if it does not require high creative inputs Introduce ideas/ new initiatives in the world of art, design, media, communication, and creative technology to the team. Ability to deliver constructive feedback on projects to the team Ensure consistency in design across all the online and offline marketing channels Strong conceptual skills in layout and design Ability to breakdown creative briefs and meet the constraints of cost, time, and client Work with clients to develop and refine creative briefs that will meet clients??objectives, when necessary Work with onsite teams to answer client queries and to advise the client on the best solutions to their brand communication needs Negotiate with clients to amend ideas in line with their wishes and explain what is and is not possible Keep clients abreast of progress and answer their questions. Communication and presentation skills: Excellent communication (written and verbal) and confident presentation skills to pitch ideas to clients or directors and explain their ideas to members of their creative team. Adhere to workflow processes and best practices in all day-to-day activities. Ensure the same for the extended team as well. Ensure a high level of quality output, minimize job cycle rework, and find solutions to minimize errors Inspire the team and instill confidence to boost the team's motivation level Hire, develop, and manage the creative team Oversee photo or TV shoots Select external suppliers/vendors when necessary Sign off projects/deliveries before they are presented to the client Other Competencies Strong and innovative approach to problem solving and finding solutions Excellent communicator (written and verbal, formal and informal) Flexible and proactive/self-motivated working style with strong personal ownership of problem resolution Ability to multi-task under pressure and work independently with minimal supervision. Ability to prioritize when under pressure Excellent interpersonal skills are necessary. They need a clear creative vision while staying open to others??ideas. LOCATION We currently work in a remote hybrid model with offices in Chennai and Bangalore. TIMINGS We work on rotational shifts that change depending on the region you are working with and at the discretion of your line manager.

column2: Job Description : We're looking for a Brand Executive for our Brand Consultancy Team, who enjoys leveraging well-informed brand and consumer insights to create compelling, channel-right narratives for brands. From discovering opportunity spaces through competitive audits to developing consumer journeys and brand positioning territories, you can tell brand stories across the digital landscape, and the best way to drive an audience to these stories. What do we expect from you? - You must have an inclination towards brand strategy. - Strong balance of thought and action and a passion for understanding a client's business and arriving at insights that solve their challenges via their brand. - You will be an analytical, critical thinker with an expert-level understanding of branding, business and strategic planning. - You will have an inherent curiosity and be an innovative thinker with the ability to see the big picture, present and future, and explore possibilities with the client. - You will be results-focused and collaborative and possess an enthusiastic approach grounded in firm strategy. - You're an excellent communicator and influencer that thrives in a fast-paced, highly-collaborative and multi-disciplinary team. Responsibilities : - A Brand Executive who brings us experience in project management in a branding consultancy, advertising agency or business consultancy. - You will have experience working with clients and being a key contributor to the project success. - You will participate in, and often lead, brand discussions, client workshops, brainstorms and the development of strategic deliverables. - You will have excellent client presence, organizational and detail-orientation skills, excellent written and verbal communication, and the ability to work in a fast-moving environment that is strategically and intellectually agile. - You'll be respectful of, and comfortable with, changing priorities, and be able to work with people across the company to manage this effectively. - You will use your exceptional organizational skills and proactive approach to understand the challenges of the team members, problem solving to find a great solution which drives results. And most importantly, you'll not be afraid to roll up your sleeves and get involved.

column2: We are seeking a talented and creative Social Media Manager to join our wedding photography company.      As the Social Media Manager, you will be responsible for handling our Instagram presence, collaborating with our photographers and cinematographers, planning engaging campaigns, and working closely with our PR team to differentiate our brand from competitors.         Responsibilities:         Instagram Management:         Develop and execute a comprehensive Instagram strategy to enhance brand visibility, engagement, and conversion rates.         Create and curate compelling content, including high-quality images and videos, that showcases our wedding photography services and captures the essence of our brand.         Craft engaging captions and utilize relevant hashtags to optimize reach and engagement.         Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries from followers in a timely and professional manner.         Analyze Instagram insights and data to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and adjust strategies accordingly.           Collaboration with Photographers and Cinematographers:           Collaborate closely with our team of photographers and cinematographers to obtain high-quality visual assets for social media content.         Coordinate with editors to create captivating reels and highlight videos that showcase our wedding photography and cinematography services.         Work collaboratively with the creative team to ensure consistent branding across all social media platforms.         Campaign Planning:         Conceptualize, plan, and execute strategic campaigns on Instagram to promote our services, special offers, and seasonal promotions.         Collaborate with the marketing team to create visually appealing and engaging content for campaigns.         Monitor campaign performance, track metrics, and provide insights and recommendations for future campaigns.           Branding and PR:           Work closely with the PR team to establish and maintain a unique brand identity that sets us apart from competitors.         Collaborate on initiatives to enhance brand awareness, including cross-promotion with influencers, collaborations, and partnerships.         Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for differentiation and innovation.           Requirements:           Previous experience as a Social Media Manager, preferably in the wedding or photography industry. (Added advantage)         Proven track record of managing and growing Instagram accounts, increasing engagement and followers.         Strong visual and creative skills, with a keen eye for aesthetics and an understanding of photography and cinematography.         Proficiency in content creation and editing tools, as well as a good understanding of Instagram algorithms and features.         Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling captions and engage with followers.         Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.         Analytical mindset, with the ability to analyze social media data and derive insights for optimization.         Knowledge of current social media trends, best practices, and emerging platforms.         Join our team and be at the forefront of creating an impactful social media presence for our wedding photography company. If you have a passion for social media, a creative mindset, and the ability to collaborate effectively, we would love to hear from you.         To apply, please submit your resume, a portfolio or examples of your previous social media work, and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and ideas for enhancing our social media presence.

column2: We are looking for an experienced individual to take ownership and lead the end-to-end Social Media Marketing channels for each of the products of MTAP Technologies and creating growth campaigns and executing our acquisition strategies.              This opportunity requires the ability to operate with confidence in a dynamic, technical environment across multiple social media marketing channels such as Linkedin,Instagram,Twitter etc. As leading Digital Marketing operations, you will ensure proper execution of social media marketing campaigns, overseeing project critical success factors, Timelines and dependencies in partnership with the Content, Graphics, Marketing agencies, Head of Marketing etc.              S/he will develop, implement, track, and optimize plans along with marketing campaigns across all digital channels. An ideal candidate can execute lead generation strategies. A strong grasp of concepts regarding marketing tools, strategies, and integrated digital marketing campaigns is a must.              The role will be working directly with the head of marketing on strategy and growth of one of the new products for the Indian market.            Job Responsibilities:            Plan, execute and track all paid marketing campaigns across Facebook, Linkedin, Emails and other paid acquisition channels.              Plan different marketing campaigns and cover them from a social media perspective including but not limited to BTL, Activation, Events etc.              Competition mapping for all 3 products on various platforms.              Crafting compelling content or getting it developed.              Define KPIs and KRAs for social media campaigns.              Negotiating with various agency partners / vendors.              Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with marketing goals and brand identity.              Monitor and analyze social media analytics to track campaign effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.              Build digital marketing process and automation Own the entire lead funnel from ideation -> launch -> iteration.              Identify opportunities to improve lead conversion in the product (landers, sign-up flow, etc.) and champion those initiatives.              Good knowledge of running B2B2C marketing campaigns.            Required Skill Set:            Highly creative and motivated individual with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital ad campaigns from scratch.              Effective in developing and implementing engaging social media strategies that drive brand awareness and generate leads.              Proven experience with Linkedin,Facebook, AdWords, marketing database, email and/or display advertising campaigns.              Fair understanding of marketing automation for B2B2C segment, conversion analytics funnel and ABM campaign.              Up-to-date with social media trends, best practices, and emerging platforms.              Proven experience in identifying target audiences and in creatively devising and leading across channels marketing campaigns that engage, educate, and motivate.              Solid knowledge of website analytics tools.              Prior work-ex in SaaS or technology product companies is preferred.              Excellent communication verbal and written.

column2: ?       Sounds good rightOk, let s move onto some more info about the role. First, the basics:                    Brainlabs is a wildly successful business because we have a remarkable bunch of Brainlabbers.     We re not cloned in a laboratory - as the name might suggest. In fact we re a diverse group of over 800 people located across the world. The vital DNA we all have in common is a commitment to doing our best work in an environment designed to help us to do just that.     We are committed to our culture () and are looking for people to join Brainlabs who believe in it too. In return, we pledge to make Brainlabs a place for you to:        Do the best work of your career     Work with positive people in a collaborative culture     Be part of building the global agency of the future         About the role       Sounds good rightOk, let s move onto some more info about the role. First, the basics:       As a Paid Search Strategist, you will work across all aspects of clients paid search media campaigns, including initial planning, implementation, monitoring, optimisation, analysis and reporting. You ll be responsible for implementing strategies that meet and exceed clients KPIs and drive their business forward.       What you do         Ensure budgets, optimisations, and performance are executed and aligned with client goals     Build campaigns, keywords, and ads     Produce insights, reports and commentary for clients      Ensure agency processes, best practices and tech automation are implemented across your clients accounts     Support the team with QA checking campaign builds and account changes     Communicate performance opportunities issues with the team while providing ideas for solutions     Perform regular analyses and make data-driven recommendations, following our test and learn methodology         Who you are           Minimum 4+ years of Experience in Paid Search        You are eager to further develop your paid search expertise by working with some of the world s top brands and utilizing Brainlabs best practices, processes, and tech. You have 2-4 years experience managing paid search accounts and are curious to learn more advanced strategies and tactics.     What particular set of skills would suit this role     Proactive and solutions-focused     Passion for marketing and/or the digital world     Smart and data-driven approach to work     Experience as a Paid Search Strategist     Hands-on experience of Google Ads, Microsoft Ads, and SA360     Excellent communication skills, both written and verbally, with the ability to connect reporting metrics to optimization actions.     Able to take direction and then work independently, utilizing paid search skills to identify optimization opportunities         How you succeed         You will win by living our four core values every day in the way you approach your own work and how you work with others. This will help you to build highly effective teams, grow relationships and win for our clients.    KPIs     Fast and flawless project delivery - Delivering assigned tasks (both ad hoc and recurring) on time by utilizing defined best practices and QA processes to ensure consistency.     Client growth - Increasing client investment in paid search over time by optimizing current activity and identifying growth opportunities in current campaigns.

column2: Role: Influencer Marketing Specialist Experience: 1- 10 years Location: Hyderabad/ Bangalore ( PAN INDIA )  Language: English & Hindi Shift Timings: India -10am to 6pm IST ( REMOTE ) Market: Domestic and International  Office-optional Looking for Influencer Marketing Experience Candidate. Roles and Responsibilities: The job role for an influencer marketing specialist with sales experience focused on selling packages of reels and social media posts for small businesses, such as restaurants typically involves: Prospecting & Lead Generation   - Identifying potential clients particularly small businesses interested in enhancing their social media presence through reels and social media posts that could benefit from influencer marketing services. Outreach & Relationship Building   - Initiating contact with potential clients through various channels such as cold calls, emails and networking events. Building and nurturing relationships to understand their needs and pain points. Consultative Selling   - Conducting consultations with prospective clients to assess their social media goals, target audience and content needs. Presentation & Proposal - Presenting the influencers marketing packages in a compelling manner, highlighting the benefits of influencer marketing, emphasizing the value of reels and social media posts in driving engagement and conversions and potential ROI for the business. Negotiation   : Negotiating terms, pricing and deliverables to ensure a mutually beneficial partnership between the influencer and the small business, overcoming objections and addressing concerns. Closing Sales   - Securing agreements and closing sales by addressing any concerns, objections or questions, objections or questions from the small businesses. Key Requirements: 1. Minimum 1 to 5 years of influencer marketing experience with a blend of sales and digital marketing skills. 2. Understanding of social media platforms, knowledge of how platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Tik Tok etc operate and their specific features (e.g., reels, posts and stories) 3. Influencer marketing expertise, understanding the dynamics of influencer marketing, including identifying suitable influencers, negotiation tactics and campaign management. 4. Understanding of content creation best practices across digital platforms. 5. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Qualifications: 1. A bachelors degree in Sales & Marketing/Business Studies or other related areas 2. Minimum of sales knowledge on social media platforms. 3. Digital Marketing and Influencer Marketing Skills. 4. Previous experience in digital marketing, social media management, influencer marketing or related fields, this could include full time/freelance work in social media marketing or influencer outreach.

column2: C ompany Description Exhibit & TopGear Mag India is a dynamic and innovative organization based in Mumbai. Exhibit Magazine, the prime-selling magazine in India, covers the fields of Auto, Tech, Lifestyle, and more. With a reputation for maintaining high standards across its platforms, Exhibit has also established itself as a leader in Influencer Marketing.  Role Description This is a full-time on-site role for a Tech & Auto Host. The Tech & Auto Host will be responsible for hosting events and delivering engaging content related to technology and automobiles. The role will involve conducting interviews, presenting product demonstrations, and providing insightful commentary on the latest trends and innovations in the industry. The Tech & Auto Host will collaborate with the team to create compelling content for various platforms. Responsibilities Host scripted and unscripted video content, including interviews, news updates, product reviews, tutorials, and more. Connect with the audience by delivering content in an engaging, energetic, and relatable manner. Work with the content team to develop scripts, outlines, and talking points for videos, ensuring accuracy and clarity. Conduct interviews with guests, experts, and personalities, fostering engaging conversations and insightful discussions. Represent the brand with professionalism, enthusiasm, and authenticity on camera and during public appearances. Coordinate with the production team, including directors, camera operators, and editors, to ensure smooth filming and post-production processes. Keep abreast of industry trends, news, and developments to provide relevant and timely content to our audience. Requirements Previous experience as a video host, presenter, journalist, or similar role is preferred. Excellent on-camera presence, public speaking skills, and ability to engage and captivate audiences. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to conduct interviews and moderate discussions effectively. Comfortable working with scripted and unscripted content, and adapting to different video formats and styles. Knowledge of video production equipment, techniques, and best practices is a plus. Flexibility to work irregular hours, including evenings and weekends, to accommodate filming schedules and live events. Creative mindset, with the ability to contribute ideas for content development and audience engagement strategies.

Content Creation: Develop engaging and creative video content for various platforms including social media (e.g., Instagram, TikTok, YouTube), websites, and marketing campaigns. Conceptualize, script, shoot, and edit videos to produce high-quality and visually appealing content. 2.  Storyboarding and Scripting: Create storyboards and scripts for video projects, outlining the flow of the narrative, scenes, and dialogue. Collaborate with the creative team to brainstorm ideas and develop compelling concepts for video content. 3.  Video Production: Coordinate all aspects of video production, including location scouting, casting, scheduling, and equipment setup. Direct talent and crew during filming to ensure the successful execution of the creative vision. 4.  Editing and Post-Production: Edit raw footage to produce polished and cohesive video content, incorporating visual effects, sound effects, music, and graphics as needed. Enhance video quality through color correction, audio mixing, and other post-production techniques. 5.  Social Media Management: Manage and maintain social media channels dedicated to video content, including uploading and scheduling posts, engaging with followers, and analyzing performance metrics. Stay updated on platform algorithms and trends to optimize content for maximum reach and engagement. 6.  Creative Collaboration: Collaborate with graphic designers, animators, and other creative professionals to integrate visual elements and enhance storytelling in video content. Work closely with marketing and branding teams to ensure consistency with brand guidelines and messaging. Key Requirements: 1. Bachelor's degree in Digital Media, Communications, or a related field. 2. Proven experience as a Reel Creator, Video Producer, or similar role, with 2-5 years of experience in video production and content creation. 3. Strong storytelling skills and the ability to convey messages effectively through visual storytelling. 4. Creative flair and a keen eye for detail, with the ability to bring ideas to life through video content. 5. Excellent collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment and meet deadlines. Interested candidates can share their resume at  recruitment@oswaalbooks.com / hrled@oswaalbooks.com

column2: As a Social Media Marketing Intern/Full-Time, you will play a key role in planning and executing social media campaigns to increase brand awareness, engage our target audience, and drive business objectives.          This position is ideal for someone with a passion for social media marketing, creativity, and a desire to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic work environment.                Responsibilities:                  Assist in the development and execution of social media content across various platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.).            Engage with our online community by responding to comments, messages, and monitoring social media trends.            Support the creation of visually appealing graphics and content that align with our brand identity.            Conduct research on industry trends and competitors to contribute to content planning.            Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm and implement new social media strategies.            Take ownership of social media campaigns from planning to execution, analyzing results and optimizing strategies for future success.            Develop and manage a social media content calendar to ensure consistent and timely posting.            Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate social media into broader marketing initiatives.            Monitor social media analytics and prepare regular reports on key metrics.            Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging social media platforms to recommend new strategies.                      Requirements          Currently enrolled in or recent graduate from a relevant degree program or Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field for the full-time role.            Strong understanding of social media platforms, trends, and best practices.            Creative mindset with the ability to generate engaging and shareable content.            Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.            Proficiency in graphic design tools and video editing software is a plus.            Knowledge of social media analytics and reporting tools.                      Benefits        Hands-On Experience: You will have the opportunity to work on real social media marketing campaigns, gaining practical experience in a professional setting.                    Mentorship: You will receive guidance and mentorship from our experienced marketing team, providing you with insights into the field of digital marketing.                    Skill Development: Enhance your social media marketing skills, including content creation, community management, analytics, and more.                    Networking: Build professional relationships within the industry by connecting with marketing professionals and learning from their expertise.                    Portfolio Building: Add real projects to your portfolio, showcasing your contributions to our companys marketing efforts.

column2: We are looking for a dynamic Graphic Designer & Creative Head to join our team in Gurgaon office. This is NOT a work from home job.  The ideal candidate will be proficient in graphic design software and tools and have the ability to assist the director in executing her creative vision for various design projects.  Additionally, the candidate should be capable of planning and executing photo and video shoots, collaborating with the marketing team, and contributing to the overall creative process. Role & responsibilities     Collaborate closely with the director to understand her design requirements and preferences. Assist the director in creating and refining designs for packaging, social media, banners, e-commerce platforms and whatever other design and creative needs she may have.  Use graphic design softwares such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign to implement the director's design concepts. Provide technical support and guidance to the director in using design software and tools while following her instructions on what to do in the designs.  Plan and execute photo and video shoots, ensuring high-quality output that aligns with the brand aesthetic. Assist and accompany the director on fieldwork regarding printing, packaging and so on. Coordinate with the marketing team to integrate visual elements into marketing campaigns and initiatives. Co- ordinate with and manage vendors associated to your work.  Stay updated on design trends and best practices to enhance the quality and effectiveness of design projects. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, or related field. Minimum 3 years of experience in graphic design, with proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Strong technical skills in using design software and tools, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues. Experience in planning and executing photo and video shoots.Familiarity with iPhone photography and other photography techniques. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work closely with the director, marketing team, and other stakeholders. Attention to detail and a strong sense of aesthetics. Ability to work independently and manage time effectively to meet deadlines   How to Apply:   Interested candidates are requested to send their updated resumes and portfolio samples to office@myravedaluxury.com  Please include "Graphic Designer & Creative Head Application" in the subject line of the email.

column2: Skill required:  Marketing Operations - Content management Designation:  Associate Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 0 to 1 years  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song all powered by the worlds largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. In this role, you will be responsible for the requirement gathering, deployment, monitoring, optimization & performance reporting of various ad campaigns including display advertising (banner ads or rich media advertising), search advertising, online video advertising, etc. You will also be responsible for technically configuring ad campaigns on client's servers to run multiple placements across publishers. he Ad Traffickers are responsible for technically configuring ad campaigns on client's servers to run multiple placements across publishers. They are essentially enabling advertisers to manage their ad campaigns and maximize revenue, while also helping publishers to optimally utilize their inventory. These professionals have an understanding of Ad serving platforms and can explain the online ad operations ecosystem of audience targeting and technology, online measurement, display ad buying, delivery and measurement platforms.You will be required to set up campaigns on platforms like Google Ad Manager, Campaign Manager and other such platforms What are we looking for? Adaptable and flexible  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your primary interaction is within your own team and your direct supervisor  In this role you will be given detailed instructions on all tasks  The decisions that you make impact your own work and are closely supervised  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team with a predetermined, narrow scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification Any Graduation

column1: Looking For Executives - Social Media Marketing | Work from Office|
column2: Role & responsibilities: Content Creation: Copywriting: Crafting compelling and engaging copy for social media posts, ensuring it aligns with the brand's voice and tone.  Design: Create graphic designs using design tools like Canva to create visually appealing and shareable content, including images, infographics, and videos. Strategy Development: Content Strategy: Planning and developing a content calendar that aligns with the overall marketing and business goals. Campaign Planning: Creating and executing social media campaigns to increase brand awareness, engagement, and conversions. Audience Engagement: Monitoring trends, responding to comments, and engaging with the audience to build a community around the brand. Scheduling and Publishing: Scheduling Tools: Utilizing social media scheduling tools to plan and automate the posting of content across different platforms. Timing Optimization: Identifying optimal posting times based on the target audience's behavior and platform algorithms. Analytics and Reporting: Performance Monitoring: Tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) such as likes, shares, comments, click-through rates, and conversions. Data Analysis: Analyzing social media metrics to gain insights into the effectiveness of campaigns and making data-driven decisions. Reporting: Creating regular reports to showcase social media performance and suggesting improvements. Community Management: Customer Service: Addressing customer inquiries, feedback, and complaints on social media platforms. column2: Skill required:Paid Media Services - Ad Trafficking  Designation:Management Level - Associate  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:1 to 3 years  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. In this role, you will be responsible for the requirement gathering, deployment, monitoring, optimization & performance reporting of various ad campaigns including display advertising (banner ads or rich media advertising), search advertising, online video advertising, etc. You will also be responsible for technically configuring ad campaigns on client's servers to run multiple placements across publishers. he Ad Traffickers are responsible for technically configuring ad campaigns on client's servers to run multiple placements across publishers. They are essentially enabling advertisers to manage their ad campaigns and maximize revenue, while also helping publishers to optimally utilize their inventory. These professionals have an understanding of Ad serving platforms and can explain the online ad operations ecosystem of audience targeting and technology, online measurement, display ad buying, delivery and measurement platforms.You will be required to set up campaigns on platforms like Google Ad Manager, Campaign Manager and other such platforms  What are we looking for? --Select--  Ability to perform under pressure  Problem-solving skills  --Select-- Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor  You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments  The decisions that you make would impact your own work  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

The ideal candidate will be responsible for planning, implementing, and optimizing paid social media campaigns across various platforms to meet client objectives. This role requires a deep understanding of social media advertising, excellent communication skills, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced agency environment.               Key Responsibilities:                 Develop and execute paid social media strategies for clients, ensuring alignment with their marketing objectives and budget constraints.         Manage the end-to-end execution of paid social campaigns, including campaign setup, ad creative development, audience targeting, and ongoing optimization.         Conduct thorough audience research and segmentation to identify target demographics and interests for each client campaign.         Collaborate with clients and internal teams to define campaign goals, KPIs, and reporting requirements.         Monitor campaign performance metrics closely, analyze data insights, and provide regular performance reports to clients.         Optimize campaigns based on performance data, adjusting targeting, ad creative, and budget allocation as needed to improve results.         Stay up-to-date on industry trends, platform updates, and best practices in paid social media advertising.         Act as a primary point of contact for clients regarding paid social media campaigns, addressing questions, concerns, and providing strategic recommendations.         Work closely with cross-functional teams, including creative, content, and analytics, to ensure seamless campaign execution and alignment with client objectives.         Provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members, sharing expertise and best practices in paid social media advertising.                 Qualifications and Skills:                 Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, Advertising, or related field.         Minimum of 2.5 years of experience managing paid social media campaigns within a digital marketing agency environment.         Proficiency in social media advertising platforms such as Facebook Ads Manager, Twitter Ads, LinkedIn Campaign Manager, etc.         Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret campaign performance data, draw actionable insights, and make data-driven decisions.         Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively communicate campaign strategies, results, and recommendations to clients.         Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple client accounts simultaneously.         Creative thinking and the ability to develop engaging ad copy, imagery, and video content for social media campaigns.         Experience with A/B testing methodologies and campaign optimization techniques.         Up-to-date knowledge of digital marketing trends, social media platforms, and industry best practices.         Proven track record of successfully managing and optimizing paid social media campaigns to achieve client objectives.
column11: Analytical skills, Social Media Executive, Social media, Management, Budgeting, Digital marketing, Marketing communication, Advertising, Analytics, creative content

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated candidate specializing in Biddable Media/Paid Media to join our dynamic team. The Senior Executive - Biddable Media will play a crucial role in driving our online advertising campaigns to maximize ROI, increase brand visibility, and generate quality leads. The ideal candidate should possess a deep understanding of search engine marketing (SEM), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, and Paid Social . If youre a data-driven professional with a passion for digital marketing, we want to hear from you.              Key Responsibilities:                 1. Keyword Research and Analysis:               o Conduct comprehensive keyword research to identify high-performing keywords relevant to the business and industry.             o Analyze keyword trends and competition to optimize ad targeting and bidding strategies.               2. Campaign Management   :             o Develop and execute paid social media advertising campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.             o Create, manage, and optimize pay-per-click (PPC) advertising campaigns across various platforms (UAC, Shopping Ads, Google Ads, Bing Ads).             o Develop and implement ad copy and landing page strategies to improve ad relevance and quality score.               3. Budget Management:               o Monitor and control advertising budgets to ensure optimal allocation of resources and ROI.             o Track campaign expenses, analyze cost per acquisition (CPA), and adjust bids accordingly.               4. Ad Performance Analysis:               o Regularly review and analyze ad campaign performance using tools and metrics like Google Analytics and AdWords.             o Provide actionable insights and recommendations to enhance campaign effectiveness.               5. Ad Copywriting and A/B Testing:               o Craft compelling ad copy that drives click-through rates (CTR) and conversion rates.             o Implement A/B testing methodologies to optimize ad creative and landing pages.               6. Competitor Analysis:               o Stay updated on industry trends and competitor advertising strategies.             o Identify opportunities to gain a competitive edge and propose new campaign ideas.               7. Reporting and Documentation:               o Prepare and present detailed performance reports to stakeholders, highlighting key metrics and trends.             o Maintain documentation of campaign strategies, experiments, and results.               8. Collaboration:               o Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including content creators, designers, and developers, to align advertising efforts with overall marketing strategies.               Qualifications:                           Bachelor s degree in marketing, Business, or a related field.                         2 - 4 years of experience in managing Paid Advertising (Search, Social & Programmatic), preferably in a digital marketing agency or e-commerce environment.             Proficiency in using advertising platforms such as Social Ads(META, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, etc), Google Ads, Bing Ads, and other PPC platforms.             Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.             Excellent written and verbal communication skills.             Adept at multitasking and managing multiple campaigns simultaneously.             Google Ads and Bing Ads certifications (preferred).             Knowledge of remarketing and display advertising is a plus.

column1: Digital Mktg Advisory Associate - Paid Media Services
column2: Skill required:Paid Media Services - Ad Trafficking  Designation:Management Level - Associate  Job Location:Mumbai  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:1 to 3 years  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. In this role, you will be responsible for the requirement gathering, deployment, monitoring, optimization & performance reporting of various ad campaigns including display advertising (banner ads or rich media advertising), search advertising, online video advertising, etc. You will also be responsible for technically configuring ad campaigns on client's servers to run multiple placements across publishers. he Ad Traffickers are responsible for technically configuring ad campaigns on client's servers to run multiple placements across publishers. They are essentially enabling advertisers to manage their ad campaigns and maximize revenue, while also helping publishers to optimally utilize their inventory. These professionals have an understanding of Ad serving platforms and can explain the online ad operations ecosystem of audience targeting and technology, online measurement, display ad buying, delivery and measurement platforms.You will be required to set up campaigns on platforms like Google Ad Manager, Campaign Manager and other such platforms  What are we looking for? Ad Trafficking  Problem-solving skills  Detail orientation Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor  You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments  The decisions that you make would impact your own work  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts
column11: digital marketing, search advertising, ad operations, performance reporting, marketing, ppc, google adwords, advertising, Technical proficiency, digital media, campaigns, search engine marketing, google analytics, pay per click, sem, seo

column2: Execution of paid search media campaigns in the    SA360    platform for Chegg. Managing ad campaign setup, trafficking creative, execution, performance analysis and reporting.     The ideal candidate should be excited to join our team s mission to aid in the strategic growth of Chegg by building the capability of developing processes that increase capacity by making ongoing marketing activities more efficient, scalable, & predictable.           Responsibilities              Conduct market research on keywords, consumer trends, audience targeting, competing brands, industry tool, and technology trends.     Write attractive and concise copies for adverts.     Launching and    optimizing Paid Ads campaigns    (SEM) including search and app campaigns to maximize search engine returns and website traffic.     Proactively identify issues leading up to a launch and during a live campaign that would prevent hitting KPIs and performance benchmarks.     Monitor budgets, bid strategies, and oversee search platform accounts, flagging and solving potential issues with the accounts, ads, or campaigns.     Provides regular updates to internal and external stakeholders.     Provide actionable recommendations based on data-driven insights to optimize campaigns.     Translate strategic plan to a mid-level and detailed execution plan.     Analyse audience data with a strategic mindset to consistently reduce CPL.     Achieving outcomes with Performance max campaigns and enhancing lead quantity and quality.     Analyse extensive campaign data to formulate solutions for improved ROAS.     Develop and maintain a deep understanding of digital advertising best practices and emerging trends: Stay up to date with the latest developments in digital advertising.             Requirements:         Proven experience of managing Google AdWords/Bing campaigns in SA60 (Search Ad 360) with a track record of driving successful results.
