column2: The Associate Manager, Social Media for Vogue India    is responsible for the social strategy and social posting of Vogue India s social channels.   This person will be embedded with the Vogue India content team and partner seamlessly with editors and writers. They will sit alongside editors and be pivotal to enabling the success of the newly-evolved teams.   Reporting to the Aud Dev Lead for Vogue India.     The Associate manager, Social Media is part of a community of global Vogue Social Managers (an Aud Dev Lead and Social Manager is embedded in each Vogue editorial team).     They will work closely with the community and the global social storytelling team.   This role is big picture - overseeing social storytelling and content distribution - and is hands-on - with daily posting and scheduling on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and other platforms (depending on local platforms).   This person has an eye for powerful visuals, strong writing skills, social storytelling skills and understands the Vogue voice.   The Associate Manager, Social Media for Vogue India will have a proven history of growing social audiences and knowledge of analytical tools.     This person understands how data can inform a smart editorial and social strategy, and is an expert at juggling multiple projects, managing deadlines, distilling social numbers into actionable insights, and advocating for strong social content across the organisation.   The ideal candidate has experience partnering with Edit, Creative and Commercial.     They will be a clear communicator and show sound judgement. This person will display all the behaviours outlined in the Audience Development Competency Model.     Goals and structure:     The Global Vogue Audience Development, Social Analytics team s role is to bring the right audiences to Vogue, and ensure engagement and return visits.     This provides top-of-the-funnel for the Global Marketing and Consumer Revenue team. A goal is to increase reader revenue through subscriptions, events, commerce and other activities. The Associate Manager, Social Media for Vogue India is a key role in the process of building and engaging audiences.       Primary Responsibilities:     Guided by the Global Vogue social strategy, this person will adapt and realise that locally,   based on local market conditions and culture   Manage day-to-day posting, editing and optimization of content on multiple social media   platforms including Instagram, Facebook and Twitter   Master Vogue s editorial voice and tone which may be different between platforms   Select imagery, video and visual content that engages audiences   Execute on best-in-class social storytelling, gathering assets from different teams   Work with the global social storytelling team to ensure the best storytelling for the Vogue   India accounts   Work with video teams on social storytelling packages     Seamlessly integrate with Content/Edit and guide teams daily on story positioning (for   Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, for example)   Create and foster communities on social platforms   Plan, design and implement successful social strategies on cover reveals, tentpoles   (such as Oscars, Met Gala) and global and local stories.   Manage social swaps with internal Conde Nast brands, other Vogue teams, as well as   external partners   Report on content performance and present social insights and best practices to various   stakeholders   Work with the commerce team to strategize ways to increase traffic (and therefore   revenue) to commerce content   Adjust social strategy according to KPI pacing and report on any wins and losses   Brainstorm new ideas and plan rollout strategies for testing with the audience   development team         Requirements:     3+ years of social media experience, preferably with experience working for a digital   publisher   Strong writing skills for captions, headlines and visual storytelling   Proven ability in visual storytelling that drives engagement   Strong editorial judgement   Community management experience   Excellent organisational skills, focus, and attention to detail   An established ability to synthesise and communicate information quickly   Must complete an edit test (writing samples are a plus!)   Experience with video editing and asset creation   Able to work outside standard working hours (occasional evenings and weekends)   Experience in working on audience development strategies for video and audio   Ability to clearly articulate and present to editorial colleagues and all levels of   management   Ability to navigate a complex and matrixed business   Entrepreneurial, digitally savvy, with exceptional analytical, quantitative, problem-solving,   and critical thinking skills   Desired: Experience of working cross-culturally. A second language is a plus.

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.  2. Proven experience in managing social media accounts for a brand or organization.  3. Creative thinker with the ability to generate engaging content.  6. Detail-oriented with strong organizational and time management skills.  7. Key responsibilities:            Assimilate and translate brand briefs into region specific digital content campaigns ensuring adherence to brand goals, targets, 360 degree opportunities and budget efficiencies. Capture cultural, digital & content landscape research and build campaign insights.          Support quantitative data with qualitative inputs - backed up with research. Ability to work on end - to - end digital campaign strategy/planning/execution          Strong written and verbal communication skills. column2: The Associate Manager, Social Media for Vogue India    is responsible for the social strategy and social posting of Vogue India s social channels.   This person will be embedded with the Vogue India content team and partner seamlessly with editors and writers. They will sit alongside editors and be pivotal to enabling the success of the newly-evolved teams.   Reporting to the Aud Dev Lead for Vogue India.     The Associate manager, Social Media is part of a community of global Vogue Social Managers (an Aud Dev Lead and Social Manager is embedded in each Vogue editorial team).     They will work closely with the community and the global social storytelling team.   This role is big picture - overseeing social storytelling and content distribution - and is hands-on - with daily posting and scheduling on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and other platforms (depending on local platforms).   This person has an eye for powerful visuals, strong writing skills, social storytelling skills and understands the Vogue voice.   The Associate Manager, Social Media for Vogue India will have a proven history of growing social audiences and knowledge of analytical tools.     This person understands how data can inform a smart editorial and social strategy, and is an expert at juggling multiple projects, managing deadlines, distilling social numbers into actionable insights, and advocating for strong social content across the organisation.   The ideal candidate has experience partnering with Edit, Creative and Commercial.     They will be a clear communicator and show sound judgement. This person will display all the behaviours outlined in the Audience Development Competency Model.     Goals and structure:     The Global Vogue Audience Development, Social & Analytics team s role is to bring the right audiences to Vogue, and ensure engagement and return visits.     This provides top-of-the-funnel for the Global Marketing and Consumer Revenue team. A goal is to increase reader revenue through subscriptions, events, commerce and other activities. The Associate Manager, Social Media for Vogue India is a key role in the process of building and engaging audiences.         Primary Responsibilities:     Guided by the Global Vogue social strategy, this person will adapt and realise that locally,   based on local market conditions and culture   Manage day-to-day posting, editing and optimization of content on multiple social media   platforms including Instagram, Facebook and Twitter   Master Vogue s editorial voice and tone which may be different between platforms   Select imagery, video and visual content that engages audiences   Execute on best-in-class social storytelling, gathering assets from different teams   Work with the global social storytelling team to ensure the best storytelling for the Vogue   India accounts   Work with video teams on social storytelling packages     Seamlessly integrate with Content/Edit and guide teams daily on story positioning (for   Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, for example)   Create and foster communities on social platforms   Plan, design and implement successful social strategies on cover reveals, tentpoles   (such as Oscars, Met Gala) and global and local stories.   Manage social swaps with internal Conde Nast brands, other Vogue teams, as well as   external partners   Report on content performance and present social insights and best practices to various   stakeholders   Work with the commerce team to strategize ways to increase traffic (and therefore   revenue) to commerce content   Adjust social strategy according to KPI pacing and report on any wins and losses   Brainstorm new ideas and plan rollout strategies for testing with the audience   development team         Requirements:     3+ years of social media experience, preferably with experience working for a digital   publisher   Strong writing skills for captions, headlines and visual storytelling   Proven ability in visual storytelling that drives engagement   Strong editorial judgement   Community management experience   Excellent organisational skills, focus, and attention to detail   An established ability to synthesise and communicate information quickly   Must complete an edit test (writing samples are a plus!)   Experience with video editing and asset creation   Able to work outside standard working hours (occasional evenings and weekends)   Experience in working on audience development strategies for video and audio   Ability to clearly articulate and present to editorial colleagues and all levels of   management   Ability to navigate a complex and matrixed business   Entrepreneurial, digitally savvy, with exceptional analytical, quantitative, problem-solving,   and critical thinking skills   Desired: Experience of working cross-culturally. A second language is a plus.

column2: Role & responsibilities   As a Graphics Designer for our Apparel Ecommerce company, you will play a crucial role in creating visually appealing and brand-aligned design assets for our online store. You'll work closely with the marketing and creative teams to develop captivating graphics, ensuring a seamless and engaging online shopping experience for our customers. Key Responsibilities: Graphic Design: Create and design visually stunning graphics for our ecommerce platform, including product images, banners, promotional materials, and other visual content. Product Photography: Coordinate and execute product photoshoots, ensuring high-quality images for product listings. Edit and retouch images to enhance visual appeal. Brand Consistency: Maintain and promote brand consistency across all design materials, ensuring that they align with our brand identity and guidelines. Website Design: Collaborate with web developers to design and optimize the user interface, ensuring a user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing online shopping experience. Marketing Collateral: Design marketing materials, such as email templates, social media graphics, and digital advertisements, to support marketing campaigns and promotions. Print Collateral: Develop print materials, including packaging designs, labels, and promotional materials, to complement our online presence. User Experience (UX): Improve user experience by designing intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, making navigation and shopping on our website enjoyable and efficient. Trend Research: Stay updated on current design trends in the fashion and ecommerce industries to ensure our visuals remain fresh and appealing to our target audience. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, content creators, and product managers, to ensure design projects are aligned with overall company objectives. Quality Assurance: Review and approve final design materials, ensuring they meet quality standards and are error-free before publishing. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field. Proven experience as a graphic designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing ecommerce and apparel-related projects. Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and experience with photography and photo editing. Strong understanding of color theory, typography, and layout principles. Knowledge of web design and user experience (UX) principles. Familiarity with ecommerce platforms and digital marketing practices. Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment. Attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects with varying deadlines. Creative thinking and a keen eye for visual aesthetics. Adaptability and the ability to embrace change in a fast-paced industry.

column2: Job Description: D2C Retention Manager Position Overview:  We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated D2C Retention Manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to enhance customer loyalty, drive repeat purchases, and increase customer lifetime value. This role requires a deep understanding of consumer behavior, data analytics, and retention marketing techniques. Key Responsibilities: Customer Retention Strategy: Develop and implement comprehensive retention strategies to improve customer loyalty and repeat purchase rates. Analyze customer data to identify key drivers of retention and churn, and create targeted campaigns to address them. Customer Segmentation: Segment the customer base to tailor retention efforts effectively. Utilize data-driven insights to personalize communication and offers for different customer segments. Loyalty Programs: Design and manage customer loyalty programs to incentivize repeat purchases. Monitor program performance and make adjustments to maximize effectiveness. Engagement Campaigns: Plan and execute multi-channel engagement campaigns (email, SMS, social media, etc.) to keep customers engaged and informed. Work closely with the marketing team to ensure consistent messaging across all channels. Customer Feedback: Gather and analyze customer feedback to understand pain points and areas for improvement. Implement changes based on feedback to enhance the overall customer experience. Performance Tracking: Track and report on key retention metrics, including customer lifetime value, churn rate, and repeat purchase rate. Use data analytics to measure the effectiveness of retention initiatives and optimize strategies accordingly. Collaboration: Work cross-functionally with product, customer service, and marketing teams to ensure a seamless customer experience. Partner with the analytics team to develop and refine customer retention models. Market Research: Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in customer retention and loyalty. Benchmark against competitors and implement innovative retention strategies. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Proven experience in a customer retention or loyalty role, preferably in a D2C environment. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and derive actionable insights. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in CRM and marketing automation tools. Creative thinker with a customer-centric mindset. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadline. Interested candidate can speak or whatsapp on 798468886

column2: We are seeking a talented and creative Social Media Manager to join our wedding photography company.      As the Social Media Manager, you will be responsible for handling our Instagram presence, collaborating with our photographers and cinematographers, planning engaging campaigns, and working closely with our PR team to differentiate our brand from competitors.         Responsibilities:         Instagram Management:         Develop and execute a comprehensive Instagram strategy to enhance brand visibility, engagement, and conversion rates.         Create and curate compelling content, including high-quality images and videos, that showcases our wedding photography services and captures the essence of our brand.         Craft engaging captions and utilize relevant hashtags to optimize reach and engagement.         Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries from followers in a timely and professional manner.         Analyze Instagram insights and data to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and adjust strategies accordingly.           Collaboration with Photographers and Cinematographers:           Collaborate closely with our team of photographers and cinematographers to obtain high-quality visual assets for social media content.         Coordinate with editors to create captivating reels and highlight videos that showcase our wedding photography and cinematography services.         Work collaboratively with the creative team to ensure consistent branding across all social media platforms.         Campaign Planning:         Conceptualize, plan, and execute strategic campaigns on Instagram to promote our services, special offers, and seasonal promotions.         Collaborate with the marketing team to create visually appealing and engaging content for campaigns.         Monitor campaign performance, track metrics, and provide insights and recommendations for future campaigns.           Branding and PR:           Work closely with the PR team to establish and maintain a unique brand identity that sets us apart from competitors.         Collaborate on initiatives to enhance brand awareness, including cross-promotion with influencers, collaborations, and partnerships.         Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for differentiation and innovation.           Requirements:           Previous experience as a Social Media Manager, preferably in the wedding or photography industry. (Added advantage)         Proven track record of managing and growing Instagram accounts, increasing engagement and followers.         Strong visual and creative skills, with a keen eye for aesthetics and an understanding of photography and cinematography.         Proficiency in content creation and editing tools, as well as a good understanding of Instagram algorithms and features.         Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling captions and engage with followers.         Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.         Analytical mindset, with the ability to analyze social media data and derive insights for optimization.         Knowledge of current social media trends, best practices, and emerging platforms.         Join our team and be at the forefront of creating an impactful social media presence for our wedding photography company. If you have a passion for social media, a creative mindset, and the ability to collaborate effectively, we would love to hear from you.         To apply, please submit your resume, a portfolio or examples of your previous social media work, and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and ideas for enhancing our social media presence.

column2: The role of a social media intern is to create, execute and manage social media marketing campaigns and strategies that promote a company s brand, increase its online presence, and drive engagement and conversions.          Here are some of the key roles and responsibilities of a social media intern:            Strategy Development:    The primary responsibility of a social media intern is to develop a social media strategy that aligns with the company s overall marketing and branding goals. This includes identifying target audiences, selecting social media channels, and creating a content plan.        Content Creation:    Social media interns are responsible for creating engaging and shareable content for social media channels, including images, videos, and written posts.        Community Management:    Social media interns engage with and respond to followers and comments on social media channels, fostering a positive community and addressing concerns or complaints.        Analytics and Reporting:    Social media interns analyse metrics on social media, such as engagement rates, follower growth, and conversion rates, and use this data to optimise their social media strategy and report on performance to management.        Collaboration:    Social media interns work closely with other members of the marketing and creative teams, such as designers and content writers, to ensure that social media content aligns with the company s overall branding and messaging.        Paid Social Advertising:    Social media interns create and manage paid social media advertising campaigns, select target audiences and ad formats, and monitor and optimise campaign performance.        Staying Up to Date:    Social media interns must stay up-to-date with social media trends, best practices, and changes to algorithms and policies and adjust their strategy accordingly.      Overall, a Social Media intern is responsible for creating and executing a social media strategy that promotes the company s brand, increases its online presence, and drives engagement and conversions. They work collaboratively with other members of the marketing and creative teams, analyse social media metrics to optimise their strategy, and stay up-to-date with social media trends and changes.          Requirements of a Social Media Intern:          bachelors degree (Domain-specific courses would be an addition to the role)      Proven Work Experience with Social Media (preferably 0-6 Months)      Willing to work from the office (5 days a week)      Fluency in the English Language is mandatory.      Adaptability and creativity with respect to the latest Social Media Trends

column2: As a Digital Advertising Specialist, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing online advertising campaigns across various platforms, including Google Ads, Google Shopping Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads.      Your role will encompass the following key responsibilities:       Campaign Strategy and Planning:   Collaborate with the marketing team to understand business goals, target audience, and campaign objectives.Develop comprehensive digital advertising strategies that align with overall marketing goals.Conduct in-depth research to identify target keywords, audiences, and competitive landscape.       Campaign Execution and Management:    Create and set up effective and engaging Google Ads, Google Shopping Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads campaigns. Write compelling ad copies and design visually appealing ad creatives. Monitor campaign performance, budgets, and pacing to ensure optimal delivery and performance.Implement A/B testing strategies to continuously improve ad performance.       Optimization and Analysis:   Regularly analyze campaign data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement.Adjust campaign settings, targeting options, and ad creatives based on performance insights.Monitor key metrics such as click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), and more.Provide actionable recommendations for campaign optimization and budget allocation.       Reporting and Communication:   Generate insightful and data-driven reports to showcase campaign performance to internal stakeholders.Communicate campaign results, trends, and insights to the marketing team and management.Collaborate with other departments to ensure alignment of messaging and branding across campaigns.       Stay Current with Industry Trends:   Stay up-to-date with industry trends, digital marketing best practices, and algorithm updates.Suggest and implement innovative strategies to stay ahead in the digital advertising landscape. Keep up-to-date with the latest social media trends, design tools, and applications to continually bring fresh ideas to our projects.         Revise designs based on feedback while maintaining high quality work within tight deadlines.         Manage multiple design projects simultaneously and efficiently.                 Requirements:                                       2-5 years of experience in graphic design, specifically in creating social media posts.                 Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) or similar design software.                 Strong portfolio showcasing creativity and proficiency in various social media design projects.                 Exceptional attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.                 Familiarity with social media platforms and their respective specifications for graphic design.                 Ability to work under pressure, manage multiple design projects, and meet deadlines.                 Excellent communication and teamwork skills.                     Education:                     Formal education is not mandatory for this role. However, any certification in graphic design, digital design, or a related field will be a plus.
column11: Administration, Graphic designing, Software design, Illustrator, adobe creative suite, Digital design, Social media, Tool design, Management, Photoshop

column2: The Social Media Manager will be responsible for developing and administering social media content that is designed to engage users and create an interactive relationship between consumers and the company. The successful candidate will also be required to collect and review social media data to develop more effective campaigns.          Job Roles and Key Deliverables:         Research, ideate, develop and execute content for our social media channels keeping in mind the distinct content formats of each platform     Work with the creative teams to ensure the content is engaging, informative and appealing     Manage day-to-day content posting with effective tags     Organize and maintain social media plans and calendars, with posts drafted and scheduled for future publication     Ensure all content is on-brand and consistent in terms of tone of voice and quality     Find and manage fashion and beauty bloggers & influencers to associate with on a monthly basis.     Stay up to date with latest social media trends and best practices. Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and giveaways.     Listen and respond to our social media audience and engage them effectively     Assist with special projects and campaigns as they arise by bringing to the table creative ideas and execute them flawlessly         Qualification & Experience:         2-4 years of agency/brand experience in handling social media for a lifestyle brand. Work experience with a fashion/beauty brand is preferred.     Love for the ever-evolving world of digital media     Passion and understanding of social media     Excellent story-telling skills that bring ideas to life     The ability to multi-task and complete assignments accurately and on time         Key Skills :         Knowledge of online marketing,good understanding of major marketing channels,Positive attitude, detail and customer oriented with good multitasking and organisational ability,Fluency in English,etc.
column11: Digital media, Administration, Publishing, Online marketing, Social media, Relationship, Brand awareness, Management, Research

column2: Vacancy?-           2                Qualification :           Graudate           Due to a strong business performance, we are looking for Senior Business Development Executives to join our domestic Business Development team within SiRADiX     The ideal candidate would be a commercially driven, analytical and friendly individual with a minimum of 3-4 years marketing, market research or consulting experience especially proven his skills in Healthcare sector     You should be able to drive the application of consumer panel insight, influence a senior audience and collaborate internally and externally to grow and develop successful relationships with new and developing clients             What will you be doing           This role is to be the first point of contact for a number of developing accounts and new business enquiries within the team     It is challenging, yet extremely rewarding, as it involves high levels of client interaction, relationship management (both onsite and offsite) as well as designing and delivering impactful service packages for the Diagnostic Centers across the country             Lead major radiology job identification, responsible for the development and delivery of high profile account leads, insights and recommendations      Create and maintain strong relationships with all main client decision makers/budget holders, developing the application of consumer panel as a solution to answer business questions to ensure a strong influence on client thinking      Work with our Sales partners/channel to collaboratively provide quotations and proposals for new business requests and ad hoc work      Maintain a dialogue with key client stakeholders about their ongoing hot topics, regional/country priorities, proactively identifying opportunities      Develop opportunities to grow revenue for the team, with a focus on widening our network and increasing the contribution of SiRADiX services.      Coach, train and manage more junior members of the team, sharing knowledge and encouraging a culture of learning.      Support junior members on smaller accounts, delivery of presentation and client meetings.          What skills and experiences would the ideal candidate have         Experience delivering against commercial targets and act proactively in pursuit of opportunities.      Knowledge and experience of quantitative research across a range of projects      Be dedicated, taking ownership of tasks, working independently, creatively and resourcefully      A team player with experience working with multiple stakeholders and partners.      A desire to develop commercial skills through spotting opportunities proactive project-mining, and proposal writing.      Experience delivering insight based consultative projects with the ability to provide value added client insights, and present complex data clearly and incisively.      Confident, compelling and engaging communication style that conveys the expertise expected of a consultant.          You might even:          Understand how to use basic Software tools only to ease the work      Have Marketing or Sales experience .      Have learnt how to apply Marketing strategy 4P.      MBA with knowledge of local medico networks      Ability to travel      Operating Knowledge of new social media platforms          What's in it for you          Competitive salary      Bonus      15 days' holiday      Travel expenses      Once free Health-checkup and 25% discount on your health diagnostics      30% Friends and Family discount from day one (conditions apply).
column11: Relationship management, Mining, Diagnostics, Analytical, Social media, Consulting, Radiology, Healthcare, Market research, Marketing strategy
